text: Tho, muupuwelheke etu ilhapo cho Usodoma ni Ugomora ni iwani cho nthotho mwaya. Anenchi o wowo yahopangacha thoko minepa chaapannge aya chilhe, yahopanga ishembwere ni upangacha chittu cho uhilhoka cho urukunusha moopelho oopiye aya nkayaatwarushiya ntwarusho wo mooro wo mahuku o uhimalha akhalhe meettuchiho o waamuka attu onkhaye.
